https://tmrev.io/movie/413868-A Fairytale of the City 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null A Fairytale of the City explores both the light and dark shades of human experience. You will be taken on the journey of a raw, luminous Girl fleeing from the cruel confines of her childhood past. The beautiful imagery of this film and its intriguing characters both disturbs and delights; it's a magical piece of art. A Fairytale of the City
